import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import classNames from 'classnames' import Button from 'shared/button' const Alert = ({ isActive, toggleAlert, onSubmit }) => (

) export default Alert Alert.propTypes = { isActive: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, toggleAlert: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onSubmit: PropTypes.func.isRequired } Alert.defaultProps = { isActive: false, onSubmit: () => {} }
